name: GunFu Fighter
description:
[Background of the story]

The global atmosphere is enveloped by a highly toxic mercury vapor and humans have to wear masks to live. With time control superpowers you are sent to investigate whether the church is related to atmospheric pollution.

[About Gun Fu]
Gun Fu is a lost ancient skill.The master of Gun Fu can control the surrounding time and let it flow slowly.Using the bullet time effect, the geometric distribution position of the enemy is analyzed and prejudged, and the order of planned attacks gives the opponent a fatal blow. The bullets are limited. You must use the interactive environment to kill the most threatening enemy, and this is the key to victory.

[Game Features]
  • Full bullet time, minimalist painting style to recreate the movie-like fight scenes
  • Multiple weapons can be used
  • Super slow motion mode, immersive into the movie special effects scenes
  • Find the Church's lost historical documents and uncover the Church's conspiracy step by step

I hope to be able to reproduce the movie-like fight scene under the minimalist style of painting, thank you for playing my game.
